item.title: Alteras
item.description:
The world is called Alteras.

The continent the current campaigns takes place on.


The Thunder Coast is in the southeast corner of Kiranthia. It has six major cities, five of which recently won their independence from the Eldari Empire after a brutal two year war.

item.title: Divinity
item.description:
Divinity takes many forms in Alteras




/Lo-car-us/
God of combat and warriors. He is worshipped by soldiers and gladiators and his temples are schools for martial arts. His symbol is a pair of crossed hand axes.
Lokarus is described as tall, handsome man dressed in leather armor. He carries a shield in one hand and a greatsword in his other.
He is worshipped by soldiers and gladiators, and his blessing is sought before competitions.
His priests are warrior monks and his temples are training schools for different forms of combat.
